snippet: Lionel Messi proved his ability to excite has no foreseeable expiry date by producing a virtuoso display as Barcelona thrashed Espanyol 4-1 in a local derby on Sunday and team mates and opponents were equally enthralled by his magic....
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi proved his ability to excite has no foreseeable expiry date by producing a virtuoso display as Barcelona thrashed Espanyol 4-1 in a local derby on Sunday and team mates and opponents were equally enthralled by his magic.

headline.main: Unique Messi Dazzles Espanyol With Derby Exhibition
headline.print_headline: Unique Messi Dazzles Espanyol With Derby Exhibition
